class.name: MidiFileResource
class.brief_description: A resource wrapper for MIDI files used by [MidiStream].
class.description:
[MidiFileResource] loads and stores MIDI file data for playback by [MidiStream]. It is typically created via the editor's import system or by direct scripting.
The resource automatically detects the MIDI file format (Standard MIDI File format 0 or 1) and parses all tracks, tempo changes, and note events.
